func.title: VIS_Allies
func.desc: Constant for GetVisibility/SetVisibility. The object is visible for all allies of the owner.
func.remark: This value is also defined as a constant. Thus the parameter brackets can be omitted.

example.code: for(var obj in FindObjects(Find_OCF(OCF_CrewMember))) SetVisibility(VIS_Owner | VIS_Allies, obj);
example.text: Makes all selected clonks visible to their owners or their allies only.
